secret.description: Secret previously returned from the Initiate endpoint.

$block: Stores the result of an incoming quick connect request.

$ul: **Authenticated**: Gets a value indicating whether this request is authorized.
**Authentication**: Gets or sets the private access token.
**Code**: Gets or sets the user facing code used so the user can quickly differentiate this request from others.
**DateAdded**: Gets or sets the DateTime that this request was created.
**Error**: Gets or sets an error message.
**Secret**: Gets or sets the secret value used to uniquely identify this request. Can be used to retrieve authentication information.
